name: back-end
description: From top level directory /AI-NFT-Minting-App, run the following. 4. Install hardhat: npm init -y 3. npm install --save-dev hardhat @nomiclabs/hardhat-waffle ethereum-waffle chai @nomiclabs/hardhat-ethers ethers 3. npm install --save-dev @nomicfoundation/hardhat-toolbox 4. npm install web3 @openzeppelin/contracts
